original_text: The Lord said, ‘Throw it down on the ground.’ So Moses threw it on the ground. Then the stick became a snake! Moses ran away from the snake.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 그것을 땅에 던지라 하시매 곧 땅에 던지니 그것이 뱀이 된지라 모세가 뱀 앞에서 피하매

sentences.original_text: Throw it down on the ground
So Moses threw it on the ground
Then the stick became a snake
Moses ran away from the snake
